story_description:
Story French Crown pants are a modern man’s fit and will quickly become a staple in your closet.
Tailored from top-notch breathable and airy linen fabric, these pants are super comfortable to wear
as it comes with elastic bands attached to the waist which will help you to stay at ease all day.
Style these with a formal shirt and oxford shoes for an undeniably modish style statement. You can
also choose to go with a tie and layering option if you are heading for a formal meeting.

Story Whether at work or you are off duty, these solid white pants, tailored for a regular Fit from
French Crown will keep you in comfort and style all day. The material is made up of the utmost
durable fabric and feels smooth on the skin. These pants are super comfortable to wear as it comes
with elastic bands attached to the waist which will help you to stay at ease throughout the day.
Wear it with a formal shirt and oxford shoes and you are good to go.

title: Space Blue Subtle Sheen Traveler Trouser
story_description:
Story Revel in the thought that with this performance Trouser in hand, your main concern won’t be
the discomfort of your stuffy Trouser, but rather if the airplane has WiFi, or how close that baby
is going to be to your row. The specially woven terry rayon fabric makes this space blue Trouser
more wrinkle-resistant, stain-resistant, and gives it a slight stretch quality for increased
comfort, all without compromising breathability to keep you looking, feeling, and smelling your best
when you’re on the road.

title: Hazelnut Subtle Sheen Formal Pant
story_description:
Story This Cream pant is a utilitarian's dream, constructed from a durable Terry Rayon blend that's
ideal for anyone, from cyclists, to salesmen, to secret agents. This pant can handle it all.
description:
This Cream pant is a utilitarian's dream, constructed from a durable Terry Rayon blend that's ideal
for anyone, from cyclists, to salesmen, to secret agents. This pant can handle it all.100% Terry Rayon Fabric: Terry Rayon is a premium-grade fabric that’s made of rayon and polyester
fibers. Terry Rayon looks like and feels like wool, featuring a soft and supple texture that
resembles its counterpart. Don’t let that fool you into thinking Terry Rayon is nothing more than
wool, however. On the contrary, while it looks and feels like wool, it’s actually stronger and more
durable. So choosing a Terry Rayon Trouser means you get the best of both worlds: it’s strong yet
still super soft and comfortable at the same time. Terry Rayon is a high-quality, luxurious fabric
that’s not found in your typical retail department store. In fact, it’s so rare that only a select
few stores carry them, including French Crown.  .
Flat Front
Construction: Triple chain stitch in high-stress areas for flexibility and to make the construction
as tough as the fabric. There's a no-stretch interior waistband for a perfect fit on the waist where
the stretch in the fabric isn't wanted. The pockets have reinforced entry for durability and high
quality YKK zippers are used throughout.
Pattern: Solid
mid waited back to stay respectable and to keep you warm
Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our fashion very frequently. Grab it before it
disappears
Light to Medium weight fabric. Made for all climates

title: White Subtle Sheen Formal Pant
story_description:
Story A trouser that defines luxury. Made from unbelievably smooth Four Seasons Terry-Rayon, its
beauty and performance are simply unmatched. This fabric is lightweight, breathable, and naturally
wrinkle-resistant, and its versatile twill weave is incredibly soft. This light, classic Black makes
for a truly special incarnation of the essential suiting trouser. Perfect for year-round wear,
wherever you are.
description:

title: Juniper Green Subtle Sheen Trouser
story_description:
Story This juniper Trouser is a refreshing, serene addition to your gray and blue routine. Its
color is exceptionally rich thanks in part to its Rayon blend composition. Tack in the fact that
it's also lightweight and when woven together with a Trouser fabric staple like rayon, you’re left
with a naturally balanced weave that yields a high-quality, sweat-fighting Trouser perfect for warm
weather weddings and other formal occasions.

title: Jade Black Diamond Textured Trouser
story_description:
Story This Diamond textured weave, uses two pale and two dark threads to create a small repeating
shape reminiscent of a diamond. This kind of precise weave is best handled by masters of the craft,
which is why this fabric is made by the Italian mill. This blue Trouser stands out for its distinct
blue and the surface interest created by its diamond weave. The combination makes for a tastefully
strong Trouser. We like diamond weave for its textured look, but you’ll love its luxuriant feel.

title: Royal Blue Diamond Textured Trouser
story_description:
Story This Diamond textured weave, uses two pale and two dark threads to create a small repeating
shape reminiscent of a diamond. This kind of precise weave is best handled by masters of the craft,
which is why this fabric is made by the Italian mill. This blue Trouser stands out for its distinct
blue and the surface interest created by its diamond weave. The combination makes for a tastefully
strong Trouser. We like diamond weave for its textured look, but you’ll love its luxuriant feel.
description:
This Diamond textured weave, uses two pale and two dark threads to create a small repeating shape
reminiscent of a diamond. This kind of precise weave is best handled by masters of the craft, which
is why this fabric is made by the Italian mill.  This blue Trouser stands out for its distinct blue
and the surface interest created by its diamond weave. The combination makes for a tastefully strong
Trouser. We like diamond weave for its textured look, but you’ll love its luxuriant feel.
